column4: Ok, here's the deal...I've been messing with my WACOM tablet now for about 3 weeks.  I have yet to get it to work.  I run slackware 10.1 but seek help from other channels, because the process should be similar.  If anyone here is willing to spend some time helping me get this working, I would HIGHLY appreciate it.  I am having troubles every 5 seconds it seems!  Firstly I can't even get it to compile against my kernel.  I could reall
y use some help!  If anyone can be a coach, I would really appreciate it!
did you ask over on slackware? those guys should help
